dict.acceptation: 买得起；担负得起；提供；给予；

sent.orig: If you can afford a car then, a fortiori, you can afford a bicycle.
sent.trans: 你如果买得起一辆小汽车，买辆脚踏车更不用说了。

sent.orig: If he couldn't afford to stop, can any trader afford to do so?
sent.trans: 如果他不可以负担停止，任何的商人能负担这麽做吗？

sent.orig: If you can afford business class, you can afford some business ass.
sent.trans: 如果你们能坐商务舱，就要有所收获。

sent.orig: Only a millionaire could afford these prices.
sent.trans: 只有百万富翁才能出得起这个价钱。

sent.orig: I get a clock radio, he cannot afford, great success!
sent.trans: 我买了个收音机闹钟，他买不起——太成功了！
